definition: cadres and masses/party officials and ordinary people
tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)

sentences.english: Aeriform lieutenant general does group of relations intimately to be done aloof and tensely originally.
sentences.chinese: 无形中将原本亲密的干群关系弄得疏远而紧张了。

sentences.english: The contradiction between cadres and the masses is the focus in the process of building up harmonious socialist society.
sentences.chinese: 干群矛盾是当前构建社会主义和谐社会的焦点问题。

sentences.english: At this stage land issues have become the important factor which impacts the relationships between cadres and masses.
sentences.chinese: 现阶段土地问题已成为引发干群矛盾的重要因素之一。

sentences.english: Leading cadres should learn how to deal with relations between cadres and the masses.
sentences.chinese: 干部必须学会妥善处理干群关系。

sentences.english: After the reform of tax and fee , the relationships between the rural cadres and the masses have some new change.
sentences.chinese: 税费改革后农村干群关系出现了一些新的变化。

sentences.english: It can ease the rural leader-masses relationship and contribute to the construction of harmonious society.
sentences.chinese: 有助于缓解农村干群关系，为建设和谐社会贡献力量。

definition: to visit the poor and ask about their suffering (idiom)
close relationship as between fish and water
to tackle a thorny problem and overcome its challenges
to rise from poverty and become prosperous (idiom)/poverty alleviation
